themes: emphasis on social media metrics over talent
lack of opportunities for artists without specific image or sound
gatekeeping in music and entertainment booking
key_phrases: Bookers only want people who are beautiful
Or have 10k IG followers or Spotify plays
ZERO opportunities unless you sound like Joy Division or have a hot bassist
barriers_identified: preference for physical appearance by bookers
requirement for high social media or streaming metrics
limited stylistic diversity accepted by bookers
